org.cmc.music.myid3
Class MyID3

java.lang.Object
  org.cmc.music.myid3.MyID3
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyID3v1Constants
public class MyID3
extends java.lang.Object
implements MyID3v1Constants

The primary interface to the MyID3 library.

Almost all of the MyID3 library's core functionality can be accessed through it's methods.

See the source of the SampleUsage class and other classes in the org.cmc.music.myid3.examples package for examples.

See Also:
SampleUsage

Method Detail

update

public void update(java.io.File file,
                   MusicMetadataSet set,
                   IMusicMetadata values)
            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   ID3WriteException
Write MP3 file with specific metadata, drawing song data from an existing mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - File to read non-metadata (ie. song data) from. Will be overwritten with new mp3 file.
set - MusicMetadataSet, usually read from mp3 file.
values - IMusicMetadata, a specific group of values to write.
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
java.io.IOException
ID3WriteException
See Also:
MusicMetadataSet, IMusicMetadata

update

public void update(java.io.File file,
                   MusicMetadataSet set,
                   IMusicMetadata values,
                   MyID3v2Write.Filter filter,
                   MyID3Listener listener)
            throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   ID3WriteException
Write MP3 file with specific metadata, drawing song data from an existing mp3 file.

Parameters:
file - File to read non-metadata (ie. song data) from. Will be overwritten with new mp3 file.
set - MusicMetadataSet, usually read from mp3 file.
values - IMusicMetadata, a specific group of values to write.
filter - MyID3v2Write.Filter, can be used to prevent ID3v2 frames from written on a case-by-case basis.
listener - MyID3Listener, observer of the write process.
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
java.io.IOException
ID3WriteException
See Also:
MusicMetadataSet, IMusicMetadata, MyID3Listener, MyID3v2Write.Filter

dst - File to overwrite with new mp3 file.

public void write(java.io.File src,
                  java.io.File dst,

                  MyID3v2Write.Filter filter,
                  MyID3Listener listener)
           throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException,
                  java.io.IOException,
                  ID3WriteException
Write MP3 file with specific metadata, drawing song data from an existing mp3 file.

Parameters:
src - File to read non-metadata (ie. song data) from.
dst - File to overwrite with new mp3 file.
set - MusicMetadataSet, usually read from mp3 file.
values - IMusicMetadata, a specific group of values to write.
filter - MyID3v2Write.Filter, can be used to prevent ID3v2 frames from written on a case-by-case basis.
listener - MyID3Listener, observer of the write process.
Throws:
java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
java.io.IOException
ID3WriteException
See Also:
MusicMetadataSet, IMusicMetadata, MyID3Listener, MyID3v2Write.Filter

                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             ID3ReadException
Reads all metadata (ID3v1 & ID3v2) from MP3 file.

Parameters:
file - File to read metadata (ie. song data) from.
Returns:

java.io.IOException
ID3ReadException

Reads all metadata (ID3v1 & ID3v2) from MP3 file.

Parameters:

listener - MyID3Listener, an observer.
